value:
$WmMPID_クロム2,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal2,Face|Finally...it's over.$k$pRobin, we did it. We changed our
fates! We have finally, truly won.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|Yes...$k$pWhat's that!?$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|$Fi500|Indeed. The course of fate has been
altered.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|Who are you!?$k$p$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|Distortions flow through time and
space... Causality is warped and
twisted.$k$pThis world's history has been set
free. Who knows how it will waver
and bend?$k$p$WmMPID_クロム2,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal2,Face|What's that supposed to mean? And
you haven't answered Robin's
question, either. Who are you!?$k$p$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|Who am I? Robin, of course. Before
fate was altered, Chrom slew me. I
was reborn as Grima.$k$pI have come here in pursuit of the
child who calls herself Marth.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|You're saying that you're...me? From a
different past?$k$p$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|Indeed. We are one and the same.$k$pBut we come from different worlds...$k$pVery different. Perhaps it's due to the
intensity of the forces of chaos...$k$pI had not anticipated meeting
a female self.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Normal,Face|Well, here I am.$k$p$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|Would this qualify as self-loathing?
Because I have an intense desire to
kill you... This turmoil is fascinating.$k$p$WmMPID_クロム2,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal2,Face|Don't you even think about it!$k$p$WmMPID_邪竜ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Dark,Face|Oh, Chrom... You're here? I didn't
even notice you.$k$pYou've grown in strength. I will have
to tear some strips off of you before I
devour you.$k$pCome to me... You have no choice,
since the only way to escape the
Tempest is to defeat me.$k$pI am the wings of despair. I am the
breath of ruin. I am the fell dragon,
Grima!$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I should have known you were pulling
the strings.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well, well. You caught me.$k$pDo you really have time to waste
on me, though?$k$pDon't you have a Fell Dragon to
murder?$k$pAnd there's that young lady that
Prince Chrom seems so attached
to. She's Grima too, isn't she?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Don't you worry that little artifice will
come tumbling down some day? That
she'll kill your dear prince? I would.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I'm aware of the situation.$k$pI once tried to kill her, myself...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, really? My, my...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|But I know better now.$k$pThe bond those two share cannot be
broken—by anything.$k$pWe have the power to change fate.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Change fate? Oh, how adorable.$k$pBut tell me this. Can you really be
sure that changing fate will make you
happy?$k$pAnd doesn't it seem likely that all your
meddling will ruin some lives?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Someone whose life was perfectly
lovely... Well, they might not be quite
so happy as you are...$k$pOnce the world changes.$k$pAll you really want to do is pick a
future that suits you...$k$pIsn't that a little self-serving? If I
can see that, dear, surely you can.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$pOf course I can.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well, at least you'll admit that much.
You may be completely lacking in
charm, but you're not stupid.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Of course, if you're too clever... That
means I'd better kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|What!?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, sweet pea. Did I scare you? Hush
now. I don't mean right this second! I'll
be seeing you again...$k$p
